progression_issues.issue: New players take too long (>90 days) to reach first promotion
Hardcore players reach max rank too quickly (<60 days)

recommendations.recommendation: Lower AUTHORIZED threshold to 750 XP or add "New Player" XP multiplier (1.5x for first 30 days)
recommendations.rationale: New player retention is critical for game health

recommendations.recommendation: Add prestige system or extend ranks (MASTER at 20k XP, LEGEND at 50k XP)
Implement "Rest XP" system - 2x XP for first 3 trades after 3+ days absence
recommendations.rationale: Encourage returning players and reduce FOMO

recommendations.recommendation: Add social features - 10% XP bonus when trading alongside friends

recommendations.rationale: Drive engagement spikes and re-engage lapsed players
